result.description: ICT collaboration tools must be essential to support new demand-driven approaches which should be recommended for supply chain optimization. To ensure applicability of defined / simulated business models some existing e-collaboration or RFID tools will be suggested as well as potential adaptation required to match with construction logistic constraints.
